name: WP Author Meta
author: Nazakat Ali

sections.description:
This is a simple plugin that allows you to set author name that appears in facebook news feeds, when someone shares it on facebook. See screenshots and live demo.

LATEST UPDATE

Now you can set author’s facebook profile link as author name for posts in news feeds. SEE LIVE DEMO and SCREENSHOTS

How it Works

  • To enable author’s facebook profile link setting, Goto Profile >> Facebook Profile Link (WP Author Meta ) and enter the full url of your facebook profile. This option sets the profile link as author’s name for single post/pages.
  • For non-single pages like categories, date archives, tags, hompage etc
    Goto Settings >> WP Author Meta and fill the last field with the fb profile link.

  • If you have multiple auhtor’s then each author must fill the field Profile >> Facebook Profile Link (WP Author Meta ) with facebook profile link.
    .e.g. https://www.facebook.com/username.

  • If you have any questions feel free to ask me, Thanks.

How To Use:

  • Please Read Carefully
  1. By default this plugin automatically sets the author name for all post/pages etc. i.e. for all single post/pages.
    • This plugin gets the author name of each post/page etc. and set it as a autor name for facebook meta.
    • Note: Default value is your public name i.e name you set in your profile => [Display name publicly as].
    • You can set your own custom author name for all post/pages here **Settings >> WP Author Meta **.
  2. By default this plugin does not automatically sets author name for archives, category, tags, hompage, date archives etc. You can set your custom author name for all these pages in settings page of this plugin.

Note:

  • If you want to set same author name for whole website/blog goto *Settings >> WP Author Meta *** and fill both the fields with **same author name.
    • It is useful for personal blogs or if you want to set your brand name as author name

sections.installation:
• Upload the **WP Author Meta ** plugin to your blog, Activate it, and you’re done!
  • Goto **Settings >> WP Author Meta ** to configure.
